name: Don't do PURPLE
description:
MAGENTA with YELLOW makes RED
RED  with YELLOW makes ORANGE

This is a simple educational game where you have to merge colors to archieve the color requested by the game.
Doing that you recieve bridge tiles that allow you to progress, if you're so slow, a big purple wall will get you so DON'T STOP!!!

To make sure that anyone got lost: you can navigate on the menu with arrow keys or WASD. Actually, WASD and E (or arrow keys and X as alternative) are the controls for all the game.

I'm sorry that there's no sound, I ran out of time and can't finish that part...
